import React, {useState} from 'react' import translate from '../i18n/translate'; import {I18nProvider, LOCALES} from '../i18n'; const Home = () => { const[locale, setLocale] = useState(LOCALES.ENGLISH); return(


{translate('about')}









{translate('cute')}

{translate('ap')}









{translate('step1')}

{translate('step2')}

{translate('step3')}

{translate('step4')}







 ) } export default Home;
